rows.label: tlk41200122_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Armoo look totally different in
other countries! It's 'cos of the
climate and...and the eco-sumstem!

rows.label: tlk41200122_04_msg0002
rows.name:
It's true! You can tell what a country's
like just by looking at its Armoo!

rows.label: tlk41200122_04_msg0003
rows.name:
Like, Armoo're really angry in Mor'dain
an' super-duper fluffy in Luxuria!

rows.label: tlk41200122_04_msg0004
rows.name:
Aww, I wish I could go traveling.
I wanna go around the world petting
all the Armoo I can find!
